attributes.action: Women to have the right to work in all areas in the military
attributes.additional_details: Women are still not eligable to work in all areas of the militery, for example, the Infantry. If a woman wants to apply for a job that involves danger and they are aware of it then why not let her. This does not mean to lower the boundries for women, as long as they can perform the same as the men then there is no difference. Please share ect.
